TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit Span`1/Enumerator<T> extends System.ValueType

summary.span: 为 的元素提供枚举器。

span.span: Provides an enumerator for the elements of a .

remarks.format: C# [foreach](~/docs/csharp/language-reference/keywords/foreach-in.md) C# 语言和[为每个...下一步](~/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/statements/for-each-next-statement.md)构造在 Visual Basic 中的隐藏的枚举器的复杂性。The C# [foreach](~/docs/csharp/language-reference/keywords/foreach-in.md) of the C# language and the [For Each...Next](~/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/statements/for-each-next-statement.md) construct in Visual Basic hides the complexity of enumerators. 而不是直接操作枚举器，使用`foreach`或`For Each...Next`建议。Instead of directly manipulating the enumerator, using `foreach` or `For Each...Next` is recommended. 最初，枚举数位于中的第一个元素之前。Initially, the enumerator is positioned before the first element in the . 在此位置上，未定义 。At this position, is undefined. 必须调用将枚举数前移到中的第一项阅读的值之前，先。You must call to advance the enumerator to the first item in the before reading the value of . 返回相同的值直到调用。 returns the same value until is called. 设置中的下一项。 sets to the next item in the . 如果传递的末尾，返回`false`。If passes the end of the , returns `false`. 当该枚举数将在此状态下，后续调用也会返回`false`和是不确定的。When the enumerator is at this state, subsequent calls to also return `false` and is undefined. 不能设置中的第一个项目再次; 必须改为创建新的枚举器实例。You cannot set to the first item in the again; you must create a new enumerator instance instead. 枚举器不具有独占访问权。The enumerator does not have exclusive access to the . 此外，还可以修改跨度所基于的基础数据。In addition, the underlying data on which the span is based can also be modified. 因此，通过一个范围枚举本质上不是线程安全的过程。Therefore, enumerating through a span is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 若要确保枚举过程线程安全性，必须实现自己的同步。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you must implement your own synchronization. 例如，下面的代码具有一个争用条件。For example, the following code has a race condition. 不能确保跨度，将枚举之前`ClearContents`方法执行。It does not ensure that the span will be enumerated before the `ClearContents` method executes. 因此，基础数组是在范围的枚举过程中清除：As a result, the underlying array is cleared during enumeration of the span: [!code-csharp[System.Span.Enumerator-no-synchronization](~/samples/snippets/csharp/api/system/span.enumerator/nosync/program.cs)] 如果之前枚举的范围内，为修订版本的同步访问阵列`EnumerateSpan`方法的以下示例中，作用`ClearContents`方法不会修改在枚举过程基础 s p a n 的数据。If you synchronize access to the array before enumerating the span, as the revised version of the `EnumerateSpan` method does in the following example, the `ClearContents` method doesn't modify underlying span data during enumeration. 请注意示例锁定跨度所基于的基础数组。Note that the example locks the underlying array on which the span is based. [!code-csharp[System.Span.Enumerator-no-synchronization](~/samples/snippets/csharp/api/system/span.enumerator/sync/program.cs#1)] 与在.NET 中，某些其他枚举器结构不同:Unlike some other enumerator structures in .NET, the : - 不实现或接口。Does not implement the or interface. 这是因为是[ref 结构](~/docs/csharp/reference-semantics-with-value-types.md#ref-struct-type)。This is because is a [ref struct](~/docs/csharp/reference-semantics-with-value-types.md#ref-struct-type). - 不包括`Reset`方法，可以将枚举数设置为第一个元素之前的元素范围中其初始位置。Does not include a `Reset` method, which can set the enumerator to its initial position before the first element in the span. (方法必须作为接口一部分实现，但大多数实现者引发异常或不提供实现。)(The method must be implemented as part of the interface, but most implementors either throw an exception or provide no implementation.)

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Current As T
public: property T % Current { T % get(); };

summary.span: 获取对枚举器当前位置的项目的引用。

span.span: Gets a reference to the item at the current position of the enumerator.

value.span: 中位于该枚举数当前位置的元素。

span.span: The element in the at the current position of the enumerator.

remarks.format: `Current` 未在以下条件之一：`Current` is undefined under either of the following conditions: - 立即创建枚举器后，枚举数位于范围中的第一个元素之前。Immediately after the enumerator is created, the enumerator is positioned before the first element in the span. 枚举器前进到范围的第一个元素，读取的值之前必须调用`Current`。 must be called to advance the enumerator to the first element of the span before reading the value of `Current`. - 上次调用返回`false`，指示范围的末尾。The last call to returned `false`, which indicates the end of the span. `Current` 返回相同的值直到调用。`Current` returns the same value until is called. 设置`Current`到范围中的下一项。 sets `Current` to the next item in the span.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool MoveNext() cil managed

summary.span: 将枚举器推进到 的下一项。

span.span: Advances the enumerator to the next item of the .

returns.span: 如果枚举器成功推进到下一项，则为 `true`；如果已通过范围的末尾，则为 `false`。

span.span: `true` if the enumerator successfully advanced to the next item; `false` if the end of the span has been passed.

remarks.format: 创建一个枚举器后，它定位在 span，并在首次调用中的第一个元素之前`MoveNext`将枚举器推进到范围中的第一项。After an enumerator is created, it is positioned before the first element in the span, and the first call to `MoveNext` advances the enumerator to the first item in the span. 如果`MoveNext`传递范围的末尾`MoveNext`返回`false`。If `MoveNext` passes the end of the span, `MoveNext` returns `false`. 当该枚举数将在此状态下，后续调用`MoveNext`还返回`false`。When the enumerator is at this state, subsequent calls to `MoveNext` also return `false`.
